text: “(Allah akupatsani zonsezi) kuti adziwe amene adapatsidwa buku (omwe sadamkhulupirire Mtumiki{s.a.w}) kuti iwo sangathe kudzisankhira okha chilichonse mu mtendere wa Allah. Ndipo ndithu ubwino wonse uli m’manja mwa Allah Yekha. Amapatsa amene wamfuna mwa akapolo Ake. Ndipo Allah ndi Mwini ubwino wochuluka
